meanings.definition: A type of fried dough pastry.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious beigne for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fresh beignes every morning.
meanings.sent3: The beigne looked so tempting that I couldn't resist taking a bite.
meanings.sent4: Her beigne was like a golden cloud of sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the beigne filled the room, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: To fry or cook in hot oil.
meanings.sent1: I will beigne the chicken in the pan for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She beigned the potatoes until they were crispy.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally beigned the vegetables too long, and they turned dark.
meanings.sent4: The chef beigned the fish to perfection, creating a crispy crust.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the beigning onions wafted through the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A round, sweet pastry typically filled with cream or jelly.
meanings.sent1: I bought a beigne filled with raspberry jelly.
meanings.sent2: The beigne with cream was my favorite dessert.
meanings.sent3: She offered me a beigne with a mischievous smile.
meanings.sent4: The beigne oozed with creamy goodness when I took a bite.
meanings.sent5: The beigne melted in my mouth, leaving a sweet aftertaste.
